name: Fire Keeper (baconation)
description:
This project was a submission to the 2023 Global Game Jam (GGJ) Team Members:

Baconation - 2D Sprites/Game Design/UI Design

Kamataya - Game Design

Wyatt/Mr.Pierce - Music

Emmanuel B. - 3D Assets

You are a caveman trying to survive a horrible blizzard during the Ice Age. Hurry to collect wood and food for your fire to keep the flames alive. Use wood to stoke the fire and keep it running. Use food to cook at the fire and sustain your hunger. Survive for as long as you can!

Controls:

Move - WASD

Run - Left Shift

Interact - E

Pause Game - Escape
